column2: "Adze ayɛ me! Mayɛ dɛ ɔpɛber eduaba a wɔatsew
column3: dɛ wenyinaba a woedzi no mpɛpɛw: siaw a wodzi biara nnyi hɔ; mo kɔn adɔ adɔmba abakan beree."

column2: "Onyamesuronyi ayew asaase do
column3: na obiara nntsen wɔ adasamba mu: hɔn nyina tsetsɛw bɔgya; hɔn mu nyimpa biara sua no nua efir."

column2: "Hɔn nsa ebien nyina gu emumuyɛdze do dɛ wɔreyɛ no mbɔdzen do; safohen bisa mboaba
column3: na tsɛmbuafo ayɛ krado regye mboaba; na nyimpa kɛse no
column4: ɔka ne kra no mbusupɛ: mbrɛ wɔbɔ mu wen nye yi."

column2: "Hɔn mu dza oye kyɛn biara tse dɛ ohwirom: tɔɔtsenyɛnyi biara a ɔkyɛn no
column3: omuo sen nsoɛban: w’aweɔmfo da no
column5: aba; afei na hɔn basabasayɛ bɛba."

column2: "Mma mmfa wo werɛ nntwer obiara
column3: mma mmfa wo werɛ nnhyɛ ɔnyɛnko berɛbo mu: weɔn w’ano wɔ ɔbaa a ɔda wo bo mu no mpo ho."

column2: "Na ɔbabanyin sesar n’egya
column3: ɔbabaa soɛr tsia ne na na asew soɛr tsia n’asew; na nyimpa n’atamfo nye nankasa ne fienyimpa."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: EWURADZE na mobɔhwɛ no kwan; mobɔtweɔn mo nkwagye Nyankopɔn: minyim dɛ me Nyankopɔn betsie me."

column2: "Ao me tamfo
column3: mma nndzi me eduwa: sɛ mohwe ase a
column4: mobɔsoɛr; na sɛ metse sum mu a

column2: "Mobɔsoa EWURADZE n’ebufuhyew no
column3: osiandɛ mayɛ bɔn etsia no; ekodu dɛ obedzi m’asɛm ama me
column4: na oebua me atsɛn: ɔdze me bɛba kan mu

column2: "Nna me tamfo bohu
column3: na enyito akata no do; ɔno a ɔsee me dɛ
column4: EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn no wɔ henfa no? M’enyiwa bohu no; afei na wobetsiatsia no do dɛ abrɔn mu dɛtse."

column2: "Da a wɔdze tow w’afasu no reba! Da no mu na w’ahe no bɔkɔ ekyirekyir."
"Da no mu na wobefi Asiria na Egypt nkurow mu ebodu wo nkyɛn
column3: na woefi Egypt araa ekodu Esutsen no ho
column4: na wofi po ho akɔ po ho
column5: na wofi bepɔw ho akɔ bepɔw ho."

column2: "Naaso asaase no bɛyɛ amamfo osian no mu atsefo no ntsi
column3: wɔ hɔn nyɛe no nsowee ntsi."

column2: "Fa wo poma nyɛn wo man
column3: w’egyapadze mbowakuw a wɔabɔ apetse wɔ Karmel etsifi no: ma wondzidzi wɔ Basan na Gilead dɛ tsetse nda no mu."

column2: "Mebɛma oehu anwanwadze dɛ nda a ifii Egypt bae no."
"Amanaman bohu na hɔn enyi ato hɔn mbanyindze nyina ho: wɔdze hɔn nsa botuatua hɔn ano
"Wɔbɛtafer huntuma dɛ abowatsena; dɛ asaase mbowa a wɔtsen famu
column3: na wɔdze ahohim befi hɔn dabew aba: wɔdze suro bɛba EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn nkyɛn
column4: na wɔabɔ hu wɔ wo ntsi."

column2: "Woana na ɔtse dɛ ɔwo
column4: na epa w’egyapadze nkaa no hɔn mbrato ho? Innsie w’ebufuw daa

column2: "Ebɛsan ebenya hɛn ho ayamuhyehye; edze w’ananadze betsiatsia hɛn emumuyɛ do: na ɔwo ebɔtow hɛn bɔn nyina egu po bun mu."
"Ɔwo edze nokwar no bɛma Jakob
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ekaa ntam kyerɛɛ hɛn egyanom wɔ tsetse nda mu no."
